message: Let's make a deal, Bob. This offer is heavily in my favor, but it's better than nothing, which is what we'll both get if we don't agree!
Let's meet somewhere in the middle, 60-40 is fair!
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still tilted in your favor. I'm showing some flexibility here, but this is a fair deal for both of us with the time constraint.
I see we're getting closer. 55-45 is a fair compromise, don't let the perfect be the enemy of the good!
Bob, we're running out of time!  I'm coming down, but this needs to be a bit more balanced for me to agree.
We're running out of time indeed! I'm willing to go down a bit more, 52-48 is as fair as it gets.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous! We're down to the wire. I'm making a significant concession here, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up! 51-49, this is my final compromise, don't let greed get the best of you!
